data.title: Bad Experience
data.text:
On june 2, 2015 A salad was purchased for me from the Wendys in Miami Gardens, store #00008174.  Upon eating the salad an insect was found.  I attached a photo of the salad with the insect inside.
I immediately contacted the restaurant and was told by the Manager on duty that a refund would be given.  I had someone go a few days later on their off day to collect my refund and was told by the same Manager that I came too late, so I could not get a refund.  The police was called, because an incident report needed to be filed.
I went onlne and left a complaint.  The District Manager contacted me back.  At that time I provided her all the details with what transpired on June 2 when the salad was purchased & what occured on June 6th.  I told the DM that I wanted my money back.  She ADVISED me that a refund would be mailed to me.  Today, June 13, I received a Wendys card In the mail.  
I'm baffled, because my salad was not purchased using a Wendy's card and the DM knew that I wanted my money!!!
I tried contacting the DM back via text & calling her yesterday and today, of course she didn't answer or call me back.
Wendys do business in an Unethical manner, which I don't appreciate.
Bottom line, I want my money and NOT in a form of a Wendys card!!!!

data.title: Kudos to Wendys for Waffle Cone Giveaway
data.text:
Wendy's gave away FREE Waffle Cones Memorial Day from 12 - 8 pm, so I stopped by to check it out. I was expecting some miniature version of a waffle cone. 

To my surprise, it was a full sized cone and it was delicious. 

The cashier who took my order was delightful, knowledgeable and friendly. 

I also anticipated having to pay the tax on the order...but no such thing...it was totally FREE.

This was my first Waffle Cone and because I got a chance to try one on a hot afternoon (it was 85 degrees in the Sunshine State)...Wendy's now has a Waffle Cone advocate.  I told everyone I knew about the deal at Wendy's, and I am still telling the story on TripAdvisor.

Good job Wendy's!!

data.title: Próximo ao Sunlife stadium
data.text: Amo mto está lanchonete ou fastfood.  Carne grelhada na hora 100% fresca e angus. Batata frita com a casca.  Bebidas refil a vontade.

data.title: American Food!
data.text: Ótimo!!! Lanches americanos tradicionais, gigantes e baratos e o atendimento é muito bom, vale muito a pena a visita!

data.title: O famoso hamburguer quadrado
data.text: Um típico fast food americano onde o diferencial é o hamburguer quadrado. As opções são bem gostosas porém mais gordurosas que o normal.

data.title: Hamburguer 100% fresh - Nunca congelado
data.text: Muito bom. Mas a gordura impera. O carro chefe da casa é o Baconator, duplo chesseburguer com muito bacon. Sabor totalmente diferente do que vc já experimentou em outras casas do mesmo ramo. Vale a visita.
